data.text: Biak-inn makheiya rasa inring khat-in marwaan tirton sari ngaidiang iheiti kha kei'n kaleijet: “Siru halli Pathian raangna kheengkam sari ngaikha nuoipil chungnga juobunru!”

Mansakhet marwaan tirton khan asiya ama kheengkam kha nuoipil chungnga aleibun. Khawa phakhan chikaom khat-um kana khuoili ngaikha ramsa mi in-eii tia jetnabi kadeeng khat-um ramsa ramil chubei katho ngai chungnga aleichul. Suok 9:10
Inni huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha tuipuiya aleibun. Tui kha mi kathi thisen alei-ang, halli tuipuiya kaom khouring rakip ngaikha inleithi.
Hiwa thengnga inthum huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha tuidung khat-um tuiring rakip chungnga aleibun, halli tui ngaikha thisen inlei-uol. Suok 7:17-21; Minpkla 78:44
Halli tui rakip chungnga karoon marwaan tirton in iti kha kei'n kaleijet, “Nang chongtan hi adik, Eh Inthiang Nang, nang na-eii halli nang nalei-eii!
Inmani'n Pathian mi ngai khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngaikha thisen inmasarra inleithat, halli nang in inmani diang thisen kha insik-ah napejei. Inmani ngai'n inchangsik kasuok kha inmujei!”
Halli kei'n maichaam inn makheiya rasa inkhat in ileiti kha kaleijet, “Karaatkhet Pumi Pathian! Nang chongtan ngaihi atuun khat-um adik!”
Hiwa thengnga mili huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha kani chungnga aleibun, halli kani kasa khan mi ngaikha leikaang nasik aleizootpi.

Mi ngaikha kani kasa khan aleikaang, halli mi ngai'n hiwa rirai chungnga wai karoon Pathian raming kha inrakook-ah khomaak inleisaam. Takkha inmani ngai'n inmanu makheiya malung leithuulmu khat-um ama raatna kha leiminpaakmu.

Hiwa thengli ra-nga huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha ramsa in-ongna mun khan aleibun. Khawa phakhan ramsa rengram kha kaziing in aleisip, halli poongna khan ajar eya mi ngaikhan inrakam in-eiya, Suok 10:21
halli kana khat-um khuoili ngaikhan ajar eya marwaan Pathian kha khomaak inleisaam. Takkha inmani itho kadikmak chuon ngai makheiya inmalung leithuulmu.
Hiwa thengli kuruk huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha inthang Euphrates Tuidung khan aleibun. Nisuo tiang kaom rengngai heiwanasik lam boolna sik-ah tuidung kha aleikang. Isa 11:15
Hiwa thengnga uichok ka-ang ratha kathamak inthum kei'n kaleimu. Ratha kathamak inthum ngaikha saraikhuo, ramsa khat-um kadikmak Pathian chongkachoipa mur makheiya inhongsuok eii.

Inmani inthum kha inlak chuon ngai katho raikhuo ngai ratha ngaikha in-eii. Hiwa ratha kathamak inthum ngai'n Karaatkhet Pathian Nikhuo nikhan raal thonasik-ah manmasituol reng rakip ngai kakhoomchun sik-ah insuok ah inleisi.
“Enru! Kei inruup angkata kajuosik eii! Mipui karra puondiar inlukleiya injak kha mumaknasik puondiar inluk-ah kahar inmani ngaikha rawaan katha in-eii!” Matt 24:43,44; Luk 12:39,40; Chonglar 3:3
Hiwa thengnga ratha kathamak inthum ngai'n reng rakip ngaikha Hebrew chongnga Armageddon inti mun khan inleikhoomchun. 2 Reng 23:29; Zech 12:11
Hiwa thengli sari huuina marwaan tirton khan ama kheengkam kha lairalak ah aleibun. Khawa phakhan Biak-inn suungnga kaom reng in-ongna mun makheiya rasa inring inkhat in aleiti, “Ahekjei!”

Khawa phakhan kool-inlek, rasa intir, ruo inri khat-um rinook kangar aleisuok. Manmasituol abool makheiya inphut tuun katung hiwa angnga kangar rinook lasuokmak; hiwa rinook hi rinook rakip neek-ah kangar kha eii! Chonglar 8:5; 11:13,19

Khawa khuopui inthang kha rupthum ma inkoithen, halli ram rakip khuopui ngaikha inkoijei. Pathian in inthang Babylon kha ngaidonna halli Pathian raangna theibomju kha ama rabing makheiya inphut min-in. Isa 51:17
Tuiram rakip ngaikha inmangjei halli ching rakip ngai-um mumakmijei. Chonglar 6:14

Karial inthang katamtak, karial inkhat in kilo soomra-nga soomra-nga (50 kg) karik ngaikhan lairalak makheiya mi ngai chungnga injuota. Halli mi ngaikhan karial kajuota poongraal ngaikha deimatormu jarra Pathian kha khomaak inleisaam. Suok 9:23; Chonglar 11:19
